subject: English
author: Text based on life of Mary Kom

mcqs.question: Who is Mary Kom famously known as?
Mary Kom is a champion of which sport?
How many times has Mary Kom won the World Boxing Championship?
In which Olympic Games did Mary Kom win a bronze medal?
Mary Kom belongs to which state?

short_answers.question: Short answer question 1 based on 'Unbeatable Super Mom – Mary Kom'.
short_answers.answer: Mary Kom is one of the greatest Indian women boxers. She was born in a poor farming family in Manipur. Through hard work and determination, she achieved international success. Her journey inspires millions of young sportspersons.

Apart from being a champion boxer, she is also a loving mother. Her life teaches us courage, perseverance and dedication.
